ygData.messageBody:
>
> And my final point of the night: (And here's where I expect to work on my
> dodge skill:) I think Bards should be denied Plate Mail. Already I can
> hear the Battle Bards winding up - but hear me out: The Bard was never
> intended to be a grunt-class. The big burly types should be the ones
> soaking the damage and such, not us. Of course, before they make any
> changes like this, they should also fix that tiny little bug that makes us
> the primary target ALL the time :(

I'm interested in why you think "The Bard was never intended to be a
grunt-class." Why do you say that? We can use all the "grunt" weapons except
the big two handers. We have strength as a major attribute, just like the
grunts. How are we not a "big burly type"?

I know I'm just one of the "battle bards" getting all wound up here, but I
really don't understand why people think we shouldn't have plate just because
Alan A-Dale in Robin hood didn't :) There's a specific set of advantages and
disadvantages we have, and clearly plate is meant to be one of the advantages.
Bards don't get double attack, kick or archery, but we get dual wield and
plate. Rangers don't get plate, but they get double attack, archery and
kick. And so on and so on.

Jyzan
